entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
